data.name: RES_database.accrualsrules.caducidaddevacacionesañoanterior.description.rotext
data.value: Vacations from the previous year can be taken until 31/1 of the current year. If they have not been taken, said vacations are lost (expire).

data.name: RES_database.causelimitvalues.limitede80horasextrasapagar.name.rotext
data.value: Limit of 80 overtime hours to be paid

data.name: RES_database.causes.deberesinexcusablesdecaracterpublicoyopersonal.description.rotext
data.value: Inexcusable duties of a public and/or personal nature

data.name: RES_database.causes.deberesinexcusablesdecaracterpublicoyopersonal.name.rotext
data.value: Inexcusable duties of a public and/or personal nature

data.name: RES_database.causes.examenesprenatalesytecnicasdepreparacionalparto.description.rotext
data.value: Prenatal tests and childbirth preparation techniques

data.name: RES_database.causes.examenesprenatalesytecnicasdepreparacionalparto.name.rotext
data.value: Prenatal tests and childbirth preparation techniques

data.name: RES_database.causes.horascomplementarias.description.rotext
data.value: Those that exceed the ordinary hours of the working day but whose performance has been agreed and agreed upon in a part-time contract. They can be of 2 types: - Agreed hours: Part-time contracts with a working day of no less than ten hours per week on an annual basis. - Voluntary hours: Part-time contracts of indefinite duration with a working day of no less than 10 hours per week on an annual basis.

data.name: RES_database.causes.horasextraordinarias.description.rotext
data.value: Hours of work carried out over and above the maximum duration of the ordinary working day established by law or convention. A maximum of 80 hours of this type may be carried out per year.

data.name: RES_database.causes.horasordinarias.description.rotext
data.value: Hours worked within the employee's planned schedule.

data.name: RES_database.causes.horasporrecuperar.description.rotext
data.value: Planned time that has not been worked and must be made up at another time.

data.name: RES_database.causes.horasrecuperadas.description.rotext
data.value: Positive hours worked to compensate for negative hours that may be worked, suitable for companies with flexibility.

data.name: RES_database.causes.permisoporcuidadodefamiliaresde2ogradooconvivientes.description.rotext
data.value: Permission for care of 2nd degree relatives or cohabitants

data.name: RES_database.causes.permisoporcuidadodefamiliaresde2ogradooconvivientes.name.rotext
data.value: Permission for care of 2nd degree relatives or cohabitants

data.name: RES_database.causes.permisoslegalesnoretribuidos.description.rotext
data.value: This is a leave that can be taken for any reason, unless the applicable agreement specifies otherwise, and there is an agreement between the employer and the employee. This suspends the obligation to work and pay the salary corresponding to the time that the employee has been absent. They are not regulated by law (except in some collective agreements). The conditions of use and enjoyment of these permits/licenses are regulated by agreements between the employer and the employee.

data.name: RES_database.causes.permisoslegalesretribuidos.description.rotext
data.value: Paid leave is a type of absence during which the worker will continue to receive financial compensation. Paid leave is regulated in article 37 of the Workers' Statute and in collective agreements.

data.name: RES_database.causes.vacaciones.description.rotext
data.value: Absence due to paid annual leave. It cannot be replaced by financial compensation, it will be as agreed in the Collective Agreement or individual contract. This agreement respects the legal minimum of 30 calendar days per year.

data.name: RES_database.causes.vthorasteoricas.description.rotext
data.value: The hours that have been planned for the employee and that he/she should work. Internal justification of VisualTime, should not be deleted or modified.

data.name: RES_database.causes.vtnojustificado.description.rotext
data.value: Absence without a justified reason that generates an alert. The objective is that there is no time justified with this reason. Internal VisualTime justification, it should not be deleted or modified.

data.name: RES_database.concepts.absentismonoretribuido.description.rotext
data.value: Justified but unpaid time of absence.

data.name: RES_database.concepts.balancedehoras.description.rotext
data.value: This balance will subtract all the "hours to recover" and add all the "hours recovered". If the total of this balance is negative, the employee owes hours to the company. If the total of this balance is positive, the company owes hours to the worker.

data.name: RES_database.concepts.tiempoplanificado.description.rotext
data.value: Planned time is the time that I have to do according to schedules.

data.name: RES_database.concepts.trabajoefectivo.description.rotext
data.value: All the time that is considered effective work, not counting overtime.

data.name: RES_database.concepts.vacacionespendientes.description.rotext
data.value: This balance shows the vacations pending to be taken. Initial vacation balance - vacations taken = pending vacations

data.name: RES_database.requestsrules.periododisfrutevacacionesañoanterior.name.rotext
data.value: Period of enjoyment of vacations in the previous year

data.name: RES_database.shifts.comodin1franja.description.rotext
data.value: Remember that you can adapt this schedule when you plan it, it allows you to assign an entry time, number of hours, both ordinary and complementary. In this example, only one slot.

data.name: RES_database.shifts.comodin2franjas.description.rotext
data.value: Remember that you can adapt this schedule when you plan it, it allows you to assign entry time, number of hours, both ordinary and complementary. In this example, two time slots.

data.name: RES_database.shifts.contadordehoras.description.rotext
data.value: This schedule is only useful for cases in which you only want to record the working day (to comply with regulations) and no type of time management is going to be carried out.

data.name: RES_database.shifts.descanso.description.rotext
data.value: This schedule has 0 theoretical hours. It will only be planned on days when the employee has a full day off and therefore will not be clocking in.

data.name: RES_database.shifts.festivo.description.rotext
data.value: This schedule has 0 theoretical hours. It will only be planned on days when the employee is on a holiday and therefore will not be clocking in.

data.name: RES_database.shifts.flexible8h.description.rotext
data.value: It is a completely flexible schedule. Employees can freely enter and leave between 6:00 a.m. and 11:00 p.m. and will only be monitored to see if they work more or less than the theoretical 8 hours planned.

data.name: RES_database.shifts.partidooficina.description.rotext
data.value: Example of a rigid office schedule (obligatory hours), with an entry at 8:00 and exit at 14:00 and entry at 15:00 and exit at 17:00. Don't forget to clock in for your breaks.

data.name: RES_database.shifts.produccionturno6a14.description.rotext
data.value: Example of an intensive schedule (obligatory hours), with entry at 6:00 and exit at 14:00.

data.name: RES_database.sysroqueries.cerciorarnosdecuantolequedaalrecalculoquerealizavisualtimeyacuantosempleadosafecta.description.rotext
data.value: Make sure how much is left for the recalculation performed by VisualTime and how many employees it affects

data.value: Check the group to which the employees belong. Short and complete route

data.name: RES_database.sysrouserfields.motivodebaja.listvalues.rotext

data.name: RES_database_one.causes.bajaenfermedadcomunaccnolaboral.name.rotext
data.value: Sick leave for common illness/non-work accident

data.name: RES_database_one.causes.horascomplementarias.description.rotext
data.value: Those that exceed the ordinary hours of the working day but whose performance has been agreed and agreed upon in a part-time contract. They can be of 2 types: - Agreed hours: Part-time contracts with a working day of no less than ten hours per week on an annual basis. - Voluntary hours: Part-time contracts of indefinite duration with a working day of no less than 10 hours per week on an annual basis.

data.name: RES_database_one.causes.horasextraordinarias.description.rotext
data.value: Hours of work carried out over and above the maximum duration of the ordinary working day established by law or convention. A maximum of 80 hours of this type may be carried out per year.

data.name: RES_database_one.causes.permisoslegalesnoretribuidos.description.rotext
data.value: It is a leave of absence that may be taken for any reason, unless the applicable agreement specifies otherwise, and there is an employer-employee agreement. It suspends the obligation to work and to pay the salary corresponding to the time the employee has been absent. They are not regulated by law (except in some collective bargaining agreements). The conditions of use and enjoyment of these leaves are regulated by agreements between the employer and the employee.

data.name: RES_database_one.causes.permisoslegalesretribuidos.description.rotext
data.value: Paid leave is a type of absence during which the worker will continue to receive financial compensation. Paid leave is regulated in article 37 of the Workers' Statute and in collective agreements.

data.name: RES_database_one.causes.teletrabajo.description.rotext
data.value: The time during which the work activity is carried out mainly at the employee's home or at a place freely chosen by the employee, as an alternative to being carried out in person at the company's work center.

data.name: RES_database_one.causes.tiempodeexcesonojustificado.description.rotext
data.value: These are times that are not authorized by the company or that do not want to be treated either positively or negatively.

data.name: RES_database_one.causes.tiempoporrecuperar.description.rotext
data.value: Planned time that has not been worked on and must be made up at another time.

data.name: RES_database_one.causes.tiemporecuperado.description.rotext
data.value: Positive hours performed to compensate for negative hours that may be performed.

data.name: RES_database_one.causes.tiempoteorico.description.rotext
data.value: The hours that have been planned for the employee and that he/she should work. Internal justification of VisualTime, should not be deleted or modified.

data.name: RES_database_one.causes.trabajoefectivo.description.rotext
data.value: Hours worked within the user's planned schedule

data.name: RES_database_one.causes.vacaciones.description.rotext
data.value: Absence due to paid annual leave. It cannot be replaced by financial compensation, it will be as agreed in the Collective Agreement or individual contract. This agreement respects the legal minimum of 30 calendar days per year.

data.name: RES_database_one.causes.vtnojustificado.description.rotext
data.value: Absence without a justified reason that generates an alert. The objective is that there is no time justified with this reason. Internal VisualTime justification, it should not be deleted or modified.

data.name: RES_database_one.concepts.horas.description.rotext
data.value: This balance will subtract all “hours to be recovered” and add all “hours recovered”. If the total of this balance is negative, the employee owes hours to the company. If the total of this balance is positive, the company owes hours to the employee.

data.name: RES_database_one.concepts.tiempoplanificadoteoria.description.rotext
data.value: Planned time, is the time that I have to perform according to my schedule

data.name: RES_database_one.concepts.trabajoefectivo.description.rotext
data.value: All the time that is considered effective work, not counting overtime.

data.name: RES_database_one.concepts.vacacionespendientes.description.rotext
data.value: This balance shows the vacations pending to be taken. Initial vacation balance - vacations taken = pending vacations

data.name: RES_database_one.requestsrules.nopedirvacacionessinohaysaldopositivo.name.rotext
data.value: Do not ask for vacation if there is no positive balance

data.name: RES_database_one.shifts.nolaboral.description.rotext
data.value: This schedule has 0 planned hours. It will only be scheduled on days when the employee has a full day off and therefore will not be clocking in.
